14 def call_service(service_name, service_msg_type, *args):
15  service_timeout = 3
16  # Connect to service
17  rospy.wait_for_service(service_name, service_timeout)
18  # Call service
19  service = rospy.ServiceProxy(service_name, service_msg_type)
20  response = service(*args)
21  return response
22 
23 
24 def clean_folders():
25  folders_list_raw = [python3_dir, blockly_dir]
26  folders_list = [os.path.expanduser(folder) for folder in folders_list_raw]
27  for folder in folders_list:
28  if os.path.isdir(folder):
29  shutil.rmtree(folder)
30  os.makedirs(folder)

37 class TestProgramManagerAbstract(unittest.TestCase):
38  language = None
39  code = None
40  description = None
41 
42  def setUp(self):
43  clean_folders()
44 
45  def tearDown(self):
46  clean_folders()
47 
48  def assertStatus(self, ret):
49  self.assertIsNotNone(ret, msg="Assert Status cannot operate on None ret")
50  self.assertTrue(ret.status > 0, msg="status : {} - message : {}".format(ret.status, ret.message))
51 
52  def assertNotStatus(self, ret):
53  self.assertIsNotNone(ret, msg="AssertNotStatus cannot operate on None ret")
54  self.assertTrue(ret.status < 0, msg="status : {} - message : {}".format(ret.status, ret.message))
55 
56  @classmethod
57  def save_program(cls, name, code, description):
58  req = CreateProgramRequest()
59  req.name = name
60  req.python_code = code
61  req.description = description
62  return call_service('/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/create_program', CreateProgram, req)
63 
64  @classmethod
65  def delete_program(cls, id_):
66  req = DeleteProgramRequest()
67  req.program_id = id_
68  return call_service('/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/delete_program', DeleteProgram, req)
69 
70  @classmethod
71  def get_program(cls, id_):
72  req = GetProgramRequest()
73  req.program_id = id_
74  return call_service('/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/get_program', GetProgram, req)

78  def abstract_creation_delete_prog(self):
79  list_names = []
80  for i in range(5):
81  name = "Test{}".format(i)
82  self.assertStatus(self.save_program(name, py_code, py_description))
83  ret_get_prog = self.get_program(name)
84  self.assertStatus(ret_get_prog)
85 
86  # self.assertEqual(code, ret_get_prog.code)
87  self.assertEqual(self.description, ret_get_prog.description)
88 
89  list_names.append(name)
90  for name in list_names:
91  self.assertStatus(self.delete_program(name))
92 
93  def abstract_overwrite(self):
94  name = "Test_execute"
95  self.assertStatus(self.save_program(name, py_code, py_description))
96 
97  self.assertNotStatus(self.save_program(name, py_code, py_description))
98 
99  self.assertStatus(self.save_program(name, py_code, py_description))
100 
101  self.assertStatus(self.delete_program(name))
